name: workflowy image thumbnails
description:
Shows a nice square version of an image link in the notes of a bullet in workflowy, using this format: ![](https://workflowy.com/media/i/wf-icon-android.png)

I suggest the Imagus chrome extension set to show full size images on hover while holding the ctrl button
additional_info:
See https://medium.com/@kitbashive_ian/a-more-visual-workflowy-a292d2369e22 for explanation

Requires https://gist.github.com/kitbashive/7bd49b131e9efeb65dd8fa7b985bafea tampermonkey script
